content: फालः --लं {@--1@} A ploughshare; <ls>Ms. 6. 16.</ls> {@--2@} Separation of the hair on each side of the head (सीमंतभाग); <ls>N. 1. 16.</ls> {@--3@} A sort of spade. {@--4@} A bundle. {@--5@} The forehead (for भाल). --लः {@--1@} An epithet of Balarāma. {@--2@} Of Śiva. {@--3@} The citron tree. --लं {@--1@} A garment of cotton. {@--2@} A ploughed field.
